error.message: Call to deprecated method calculatePluginDependencies() of class Drupal\search_api_opensearch\Plugin\search_api\backend\OpenSearchBackend. Deprecated in search_api:8.x-1.16 and is removed from search_api:2.0.0. Add \Drupal\Core\Plugin\PluginDependencyTrait manually for your class if you need it.
